testcase.name: Basic Registration
testcase.system-out: Given I am on "https://moneygaming.qa.gameaccount.com/".....................passed When I go to the Sign up page...............................................passed And I select "Mr"...........................................................passed And I enter "Opeyemi" and "Tubo"............................................passed And I Check the tickbox with text 'I accept the Terms and Conditions and certify that I am over the age of 18.'.passed And I submit the form by clicking the JOIN NOW button......................passed Then text "This field is required" appears under the date of birth box......passed
